'''Smaragdus Nephrite Fragment''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|A Teapot to Call Home: Part I}}.

It is made of Smaragdus Nephrite, which is very similar in appearance to [[Smaragdus Jadeite]].
